title: Nigeria - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Nigeria stands at B- with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Nigeria was last set at B3 with under review outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Nigeria was last reported at B with stable outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Nigeria thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Nigeria as reported by major credit rating agencies.
